overview: Meet the desperate housewives on your block...  Holly Morgan cooks it up in the kitchen.  Aiden Starr is on the case.  Cindy Crawford knows how to rev your engine.  Emily Evermoore's house is open all night.  Katarina Kat lays out the welcome mat.  Wanna be my neighbor?
tagline: It's A Wonderful Day In The Neighborhood!
title: My Neighbors Wife
